trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Ofrece compatibilidad en tiempo de diseño para los controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> provides a design-time representation of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control with a menu to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property for the convenience of the page developer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> Proporciona una representación de tiempo de diseño de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control con un menú para tener acceso a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> colección y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> propiedad para la comodidad de programador de la página.

trans-unit.source: It is the only zone designer that does not support designer regions.
trans-unit.target: Es el Diseñador de zona único que no es compatible con las regiones del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls uses links to create connections instead of a drag-and-drop user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Esto es porque <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controla usa vínculos para crear conexiones en lugar de una interfaz de usuario de arrastrar y colocar (UI).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property both appear on the verbs menu of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> colección y el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> propiedad ambos aparecen en el menú de verbos de los <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, when selected, provides a selection of color schemes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, cuando se selecciona, proporciona una selección de combinaciones de colores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> check box, when selected, displays the contents of the control as it would appear in the browser; the control will be empty until a connection is made.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> casilla de verificación, cuando se selecciona, muestra el contenido del control tal como aparecería en el explorador; el control estará vacío hasta que se realiza una conexión.

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> to support a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control as with any other control designer.
trans-unit.target: Puede heredar de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> para admitir un personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controlar igual que con cualquier otro diseñador de control.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the markup that renders the control.
trans-unit.target: Puede invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para cambiar el marcado que representa el control.

trans-unit.source: You can also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> with a custom scheme.
trans-unit.target: También puede invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> colección que se agregará un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> con un esquema personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to hide additional properties from a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo ocultar las propiedades adicionales a una personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control invalidando el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de esquemas de formato automático predefinidos para mostrarla en tiempo de diseño en el cuadro de diálogo **Formato automático** correspondiente al control asociado.

trans-unit.source: A predefined <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> with a default ConnectionZone scheme.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> predefinido con un esquema de ConnectionZone predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property overrides its base implementation to get a predefined collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> propiedad invalida su implementación base para obtener una colección predefinida que es específica de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el marcado que se utiliza para representar el control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that is the markup to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que es el marcado que se utiliza para representar el control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> asociado al diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Enlaza el diseñador al control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the set of properties associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> del conjunto de propiedades asociado al control.

trans-unit.source: Hides a preset group of properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Oculta en tiempo de diseño un grupo preestablecido de propiedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method overrides the parent method to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> properties in the designer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método invalida el método principal para ocultar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> propiedades en el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: This is because the properties in question are not rendered by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls and are therefore not relevant.
trans-unit.target: Esto es porque las propiedades en cuestión no se representan mediante <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controles y son, por tanto, no es relevante.

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de cómo invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método, consulte el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> tema de información general sobre la clase.
